page.title: 20BEACHES IN JERSEY
page.content: Wherever you live or stay in Jersey you are never very far from a beach. That is one of the many reasons why people decide to live or come here for a holiday. On a normal hot summer's day in Jersey, the beaches are usually packed by people trying to get a tan, who usually end up getting burnt. This often happens because the air is so clear and unpolluted in Jersey. Many people go swimming or do watersports like windsurfing, water skiing, sailing and canoeing. Many school children also spend school holidays down on the beach with their friends. People wander about in brightly coloured bikinis, their bodies shining in sun oil. Children lick ice-creams and lollies. Then as the sun goes down the beach is gradually deserted.
